articles.description: A contingent of nine  boxers — seven men  and two women — were to represent the country at the continental event.
articles.content:
LAHORE: The cancellation of four flights from Lahore to Dubai on Saturday-Sunday prevented Pakistan from participating in the Asian Boxing Championship, which began in Dubai on Monday.
